name: Google Cybersecurity Certificate
description: Prepare for a career as a cybersecurity analyst with a professional certificate from Google. Learn job-ready skills that are in-demand, like how to identify common risks, threats, and vulnerabilities, as well as the techniques to mitigate them.

name: IBM Data Engineering Professional Certificate
description: Prepare for a career as a Data Engineer. Gain the in-demand skills and hands-on experience to get job-ready in less than 5 months. No prior experience required.

name: Certified Manufacturing Engineer (CMfgE)
description: Explore earning your CMfgE certification if you already have advanced manufacturing engineering experience. This certification is perfect for you if you are in a leadership position or have supported manufacturing practices and processes at your organization.

name: Professional Software Developer Certification
description: This professional competency certification requires successful completion of Certificates of Proficiency in the following four key knowledge areas: Software Engineering Requirements, Software Engineering Design, Software Engineering Construction, Software Engineering Testing and the successful completion of an online exam.

name: Intro to Machine Learning
description: Learn the core ideas in machine learning, and build your first models.

name: Introduction to Front End Development
description: Front end development course is the best way to start learning valuable skills for designing the front end of websites. This course will discuss the main points and advantages of a free beginning study in front-end development. This program gives you a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, etc so you can speed up your front-end learning.

name: Asbetos Awareness
description: This free online health and safety course explains how to manage the risks posed by the carcinogens found in asbestos.

name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Acquire expertise in cloud architecture, hosting, and services. Master AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud concepts and earn a free cloud computing certification. Cloud computing skills are in high demand, and completing this course will equip you with valuable expertise, opening up numerous opportunities.

name: Professional Certificate of Competency in Chemical Engineering & Plant Design
description: This professional development course is designed for engineers and technicians who need practical knowledge in the fundamentals of chemical engineering, including plant layout and procedures.

name: Professional Certificate of Competency in Power Distribution
description: This professional development course is designed for engineers and technicians who need to gain a practical understanding of power distribution, switchgear, power cables, transformers, power factor correction, earthing, lightning protection, and network studies.
